terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her awareness of the meeting ahead of time.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Awareness of the Meeting Ahead of Time
terms.submissionValue: ADL03-Aware of Appointment Ahead of Time
synonyms: ADL03-Aware of Appointment Ahead of Time

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} balance his/her checkbook or credit card statement?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Balance Checkbook

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Balancing Checkbook

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} clean a load of laundry?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Clean Laundry

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} clean a living-, sitting-, or family room?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Clean Room

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Cleaning Room

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually carry through complex or time-consuming activities to completion?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Carry Through Complex Activities to Completion

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} drive a car?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Drive a Car

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Optimal Performance of Driving Car

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, explain.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Explain Extenuating Circumstance

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes extent to which he/she needed reminders.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Extent Needing Reminder

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Has an extenuating circumstance (such as a physical health problem, change in residence, change in support network, death of a family member, etc.) contributed to a recent alteration in the subject's activities of daily living?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Extenuating Circumstance

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he /she usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Finding Belongings

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually manage to find his/her personal belongings at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Find Personal Belongings

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Optimal Performance of Travelling Outside Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} get around (or travel) outside of his/her home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Travel Outside Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever go shopping at a store?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Go Shopping At a Store

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of food preparation.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Highest Level of Food Preparation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Highest Level of Performance of Telephone Use

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} require supervision, or help, to perform any of these hobbies?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Require Help to Perform Hobbies

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - List Hobbies Lost Ability to Perform

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent did {S} initiate complex daily activities or projects (e.g., hobbies, travel)?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Initiate Complex Daily Activities

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} keep appointments or meetings with other people, such as relatives, a doctor, the hairdresser, etc.?

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Clean Laundry

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Left on His or Her Own

terms.submissionValue: ADL03-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk Within 24 Hours After Reading

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk Within 1 Hour After Reading

terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Selecting First Clothes for the Day
